      • setBootPath

        @NonNull
public LibrariesNode.Builder setBootPath(@NonNull
                                                  ClassPath bootPath)
        Sets bootstrap libraries to display under the platform node. In case when project's bootstrap libraries differ from JavaPlatform's bootstrap libraries this method can be used to override the shown JavaPlatform's libraries.
        Parameters:
        bootPath - the libraries to show
        Returns:
        the LibrariesNode.Builder
        Since:
        1.68

      • setSourcePath

        @NonNull
public LibrariesNode.Builder setSourcePath(@NonNull
                                                    ClassPath sourcePath)
        Sets the main source path for the LibrariesNode. The given source path is used as a hint for module-info lookup.
        Parameters:
        sourcePath - the source ClassPath
        Returns:
        the LibrariesNode.Builder

      • setModuleSourcePath

        @NonNull
public LibrariesNode.Builder setModuleSourcePath(@NonNull

        Returns:
        the LibrariesNode.Builder
